Articles.Content: okay i have both the nova punch and the b9 mod packs. is there any more packs that would help with parts for building a space plane? not so much flying it but the pieces to build it. also is there any specific engine packs? im kinda lacking when it comes to space plane engines and landing gear
Procedural wings is a definite. It was like finding buried treasure when I discovered that pack earlier today
I'm working on some pretty unique engines. Nowhere close to implementation but when it's ready, Give it a lookover.

Procedural wings is a definite. It was like finding buried treasure when I discovered that pack earlier today

And procedural fairings, too. Because it has a non-decoupling version that's a procedural fuselage.
